mapper.insert: INSERT INTO servicequestion (sqno, sqtitle, sqcontent, sqanswertf, sqregdate, mid, qcno) VALUES (NULL, #{sq.sqtitle}, #{sq.sqcontent}, DEFAULT, #{sq.sqregdate}, #{sq.mid}, #{sq.qcno})
INSERT INTO servicequestion (sqno, sqtitle, sqcontent, sqanswertf, sqregdate, cno, qcno) VALUES (NULL, #{sq.sqtitle}, #{sq.sqcontent}, DEFAULT, #{sq.sqregdate}, #{sq.cno}, #{sq.qcno})
